passives.name: Vendetta
passives.effects: Take 30% reduced damage from your ''Nemesis'' and reduce their {{tip|tenacity}} by 20% while they are within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 700 units of you.

active.name: Vow
active.effects: Curse the target enemy champion, designating them as your ''Nemesis''. Choosing a new ''Nemesis'' removes the curse from the old one. Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in combat with enemy champions.
